"Defend the Lagomite Villages": "Defend the lagomite villages!"
"Defend the lagomite villages!"
"リリーパ族集落防衛"
"リリーパ族の集落を守り通せ！"
"リリーパ族の集落を守り通せ！"

"It seems some of the lagomite villages in the area
are under attack. Hurry and lend your support before
it's too late!"
"The lagomite village is located at $(0)."

"Whew, you were able to successfully defend them.
A job well done."

"/face4 All villages have been... destroyed.
It's unfortunate, but there's nothing we can do.
Return to your regular duties."

"There's a lagomite village over there.
Take out all hostiles in the area."

"Our sensors indicate one of the villages has
been destroyed. Only two remain.
Do whatever you can to protect them."

"We've confirmed destruction of another
village. Only one remains. We must try and
protect at least one of them!"

"The hostiles seem to have backed off a bit.
Keep at it!"

"Most of the hostile readings seemed to have
disappeared. Stay on your guard until the
attack is completely over."

"エリア内に存在するリリーパ族の集落が
襲撃を受けているようです。
至急、救援に向かって下さい。"
"集落の位置座標は$(0)です。"

"なんとか守り切れましたね。
お疲れ様でした。"

"/face4 ……集落、全壊。
仕方がありません。
通常任務に戻ってください。"

"その地点にリリーパ族の
集落があります。
周囲のエネミーを撃退してください。"

"集落の破壊を確認。
残り二つです、なんとか防衛を。"

"集落の破壊を確認……
残り一つ、せめて一つだけでも……"

"敵の勢いが落ちているようです。
引き続き、撃退を続けて下さい。"

"敵の出現が収まりつつあります。
最後まで気を抜かずに対処を。"

"Some of the nearby lagomite villages are
under attack! Everyone, lend your support!"

"The village is located at $(0).
Hurry towards the locations on the
markers."

"Great work! You've kept the villages
from being destroyed."

"All the villages have been destroyed…
It's unfortunate, but there's nothing more
we can do. Return to your regular duties."

"Alright, you've arrived at one of the villages.
Take out all enemy hostiles in the area."

"Blast... one of the villages has been
destroyed. There's only two left. Hurry!"

"Only one village remains. You must
protect it at all costs!"

"Great work, the hostiles seems to
be backing off."

"Keep it up! You've successfully pushed
back most of the hostiles."

"近くに存在するリリーパ族の集落が
襲撃を受けているようだ。
各員、救援へ向かえ。"

"座標は$(0)だ。
マーカー表示に従い、急行しろ。"

"よし、集落の防衛、完了だ。
よくやったな。"

"確認されていた集落は全壊だ。
……悔やんでも仕方があるまい。
通常任務に戻れ。"

"よし、集落に辿り着いたようだな。
周囲の敵を撃退しろ。"

"ち……集落の一つが破壊されたか。
残りは二つだ、対応を急げ。"

"集落の残存数はあと一つだ。
なんとしても守り抜け。"
"いいぞ、敵の勢いが落ちてきている。"

"敵の勢いを押し返しつつある。
その調子で撃退を続けろ。"

"The lagomite villages in the area are under
attack! On the double, you've got to
save them!"

"The village is... here! $(0)!
I've labeled them with markers!"

"/face2 Thank god! You were able to
